title: UICoordinator refactoring patterns
details:
UICoordinator.js refactoring patterns used to improve CodeScene code health from 8.41 to 9.68:

1. **Bumpy Road Fix**: Extract nested conditionals into helper methods with early returns. Example: render() → _handleExistingWindowInRender() + _finalizeRender()

2. **Complex Method Fix**: Extract conditional logic into boolean helper functions. Example: _tryApplyDimensionsFromInstance() → uses _hasValidDimensions() helper

3. **Excess Arguments Fix**: Introduce UpdateContext parameter object pattern. Pass { quickTab, tabWindow, entityMinimized, source, isRestoreOperation, mapSizeBefore } as single ctx object instead of 5-7 individual parameters.

4. **ESLint Complexity Fix**: For functions with many nullish coalescing operations, extract a _getWithDefault(value, default) helper method to reduce cyclomatic complexity.

Version markers: v1.6.4.11 - Refactored to reduce complexity
